entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
